name: EURO 2020 Panini sticker album
description:
Welcome to the official Panini virtual sticker album for UEFA EURO 2020. Open, collect and swap virtual stickers of your favourite footballers in the tournament.

UEFA, Panini and Coca-Cola bring you all the fun of collecting football stickers on your mobile.

Get excited about UEFA EURO 2020 by filling your album with all the players from the 24 teams in the EUROs. Each soccer team competing in EURO 2020 has a dedicated page. See if you can fill each page and complete your album!

- Get new packs of stickers every day
- Glue stickers into your virtual album or exchange your swaps
- Swap with your friends or with all collectors
- Earn special golden stickers
- Complete challenges to earn more stickers
- Scan promo codes to get special bonus packs

The app has special features that include scanning promotional items. Throughout UEFA EURO 2020, there are codes hidden on Coca-Cola bottle caps and other items that you can scan with the app to earn extra stickers for your album.

Collect special Fan Stickers, tournament stickers and badges as you complete challenges in the app.

This app is a must for any soccer fan this summer!

Ready to take UEFA EURO 2020 to the next level? Download the app today!
